author: RTÉ Entertainment
title: Britain's Got Talent live shows are postponed
description: TV has announced that its Britain's Got Talent live shows have been postponed in the wake of the Covid19 crisis, with pre-recorded audition episodes to air in the coming weeks.
content:
TV has announced that its Britain's Got Talent live shows have been postponed in the wake of the Covid-19 crisis, with pre-recorded audition episodes to air in the coming weeks. 
In a statement, ITV said: "We have been working with the brilliant production t… [+439 chars]
